#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<string>
#include<queue>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#define pb push_back
#define big long long
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define RFOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define vi vector<int>
#define vb vector<big>
using namespace std;
big fact(big n)
{
    if(n==0 || n==1) return 1;
    return n*fact(n-1);
}
int main() {
	big l,t,n,i,j,k,temp,*arr,f,a,b,a1,b1,cr,count;
	double x1=0,x2,y1,y2,x3,y3,m1,m2,m3;
	int h,num=0,prev,sum;
	vb v,line;
	char c;
	string s;
    cin>>a>>b;
    while(a!=0 &&b!=0)
    {
        count=0;
        cr=0;
        while(a>0 && b>0)
        {
            cr=((a%10+b%10)+cr)/10;
            if(cr!=0)count++;
            a/=10; b/=10;
        }
        while(a>0)
        {
            cr=(a%10+cr)/10;
            if(cr!=0)count++;
            a/=10;
        }
        while(b>0)
        {
            cr=(b%10+cr)/10;
            if(cr!=0) count++;
            b/=10;            
        }
        if(count==0) cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
        else if(count!=1)cout<<count<<" carry operations."<<endl;
        else cout<<count<<" carry operation."<<endl;
        cin>>a>>b;
    }
	return 0;
}
